Title: M-6 FIGHTER PILOT STATUS
Description: Roll for each German fighter pilot (Optional Rule). Roll one die for each German fighter on the mapboard to determine if the pilot is an Ace or Green Pilot.

notes: B-17 defensive fire rolls against Green Pilots get +1
B-17 defensive fire rolls against Ace Pilots get -1
At the expense of extended playing time, players may include this provision for Ace and Green German fighter pilots.

During the Combat Procedure after the B-17 has allocated its defensive fire and noted any gun positions which are employing spray fire, roll on Table M-6 for each German fighter on the mapboard to determine if the pilot is an Ace or Green Pilot.
Mark Ace or Green Pilots with an appropriate marker.
The +1 or -1 modifications to B-17 defensive fire rolls against Green and Ace Pilots, respectively, apply to both Tables M-1, B-17 Defensive Fire, and M-5, B-17 Area Spray Fire.
